mapper.select: SELECT id, name , local_authority_id AS localAuthorityId, email_address AS emailAddress FROM users WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, name , local_authority_id AS localAuthorityId, email_address AS emailAddress FROM users WHERE UPPER(email_address) = UPPER(#{emailAddress})

SELECT id, name , local_authority_id AS localAuthorityId, email_address AS emailAddress FROM users WHERE local_authority_id = #{localAuthorityId}
AND (UPPER(name) LIKE UPPER(#{name}) OR UPPER(email_address) LIKE UPPER(#{emailAddress}))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (name, local_authority_id, email_address) VALUES (#{name}, #{localAuthorityId}, #{emailAddress})
